name: You've got mail !
description:
You got mail ! is short narrative game that becomes a social and psychological experiment. As you go through some strange emails asking you to answer moral dilemmas, your twitch community will be watching and reacting to every decision you make ! Be careful as their opinion might have an impact on your game and turn the experience into a nightmare. 

This game was created during the Arte GameJam 2020 in Paris.
